entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character, described as panting hard and having a searing stitch in his side. He is wearing the Invisibility Cloak.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a professor, described as setting off down the stone steps with his travelling cloak barely stirring in the still summer air. He is wearing a cloak and has a custom at Rosmerta's.

entities.name: rosmerta
entities.description: Rosmerta is someone Dumbledore sometimes offers his custom to, implying she owns or runs a business in Hogsmeade.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as someone Harry's mind is on when he asks Dumbledore about leaving.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as someone Harry's mind is on when he asks Dumbledore about leaving.

relationships.description: Harry hurries alongside Dumbledore under the Invisibility Cloak, indicating that they are together and moving in the same direction.
Dumbledore sometimes offers his custom to Rosmerta, implying a business relationship or regular interaction between them.
